.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.SeekBasedResourceCollection`1<class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Customers.Customer> Query(class Microsoft.Store.PartnerCenter.Models.Query.IQuery customersQuery) cil managed
Public Function Query (customersQuery As IQuery) As SeekBasedResourceCollection(Of Customer)

Docs.param: A query to apply onto customers. Check to see how to build queries.
Docs.summary: Queries customers associated to the partner. - Count queries are not supported by this operation. - You can set the page size or filter or do both at the same time. - Sort is not supported. - You can navigate to other pages by specifying a seek query with the seek operation and the continuation token sent by the previous operation.
